content: this is was a pattern round #3 for sock madness 9 a speed knitting contest see the sock madness forever group 1 for more information **longing for spring** „sehnsucht nach dem frühling kv 596 vienna 14 january 1791 is a lovely little song composed by wolfgang amadeus mozart during the last winter of his life come dear may and make the trees green again and let the little violets bloom for me by the brook komm lieber mai und mache die bäume wieder grün und laß mir an dem bache die kleinen veilchen blühn in the pattern of these feminine socks you can see little flowers growing by the brook use a solid or semi-solid yarn rather than a variegated so you ll really see them blossom the pattern includes fully written as well as charted instructions whether you knit the socks during winter looking forward to the next season or while sitting amidst blooming meadows - i hope you enjoy the time this are the song s words in *norwegian* kom mai du skjønne milde gjør skogen atter grønn og la ved bekk og kilde fiolen blomstre skjønn 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/sock-madness-forever
